description.en:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---

description.fr: Je suis morte misérablement, le jour où j’ai découvert la vérité. La vérité, c’est que mon fiancé avait un amant caché et c’était mon propre cousin. Le lendemain de mon 20e anniversaire, un miracle s’est produit. A partir de là, j’ai décidé de ne plus croire à l’amour. Je veux avoir une relation sans aucune condition et sans sentiments superficiels tels que l’amour. «Duke Agentine, voulez-vous m’épouser?» Cette proposition n’était rien de plus qu’un mariage pour garder les apparences et sans amour impliqué.
description.id:
Di hari kedua setelah ulang tahunku yang ke-20, sebuah keajaiban terjadi. Pada hari itu: aku mengetahui sebauh kenyataan: tunanganku memiliki selingkuhan, seorang sepupuku satu-satunya. Sejak itu, aku sudah tidak lagi percaya dengan yang namanya cinta, dan mati dengan mengenaskan.

Ketika aku terbangun, aku kembali ke masa lalu. Kali ini, aku hanya ingin memiliki hubungan tanpa adanya ikatan, dan tidak lain tidak bukan hanya karena sebuah kepentingan. Jadi, aku memberinya lamaran pernikahan, hanya untuk mencapai kepentingan bersama. "Duk Agentine, maukah kamu menikah denganku?"
description.mn: Үнэнийг олж мэдсэн тэр өдөр... Би өрөвдөлтэйгөөр нас барсан. Тэрхүү үнэн гэвэл намайг хэн бэ гэдгээр минь хардаг гэж санаж ирсэн сүйт залуу маань үеэлтэй маань янаг амрагийн холбоотой байсан гэх явдал. Би дэндүү харалган явж. Гэвч гайхамшиг биелэлээ олон, би жилийн өмнөхрүүгээ буцаж ирсэн. Энэ мөчөөс эхлэн би ахиж хайр гээч зүйлд итгэхгүй. Хэн нэгний хайрыг хүсч, түүний төлөө өөрийгөө золиослохгүй! Зөвхөн өөрийнхөө төлөө амьдрах болно!
description.pt-br: Eu morri miseravelmente, no dia em que descobri a verdade. A verdade é que meu noivo tinha um amante escondido e era meu primo.Na segunda manhã, depois do meu aniversário de 20 anos, aconteceu um milagre. A partir daí, decidi não acreditar mais no amor.Eu quero ter um relacionamento sem amarras e sem sentimentos superficiais, como o amor."Duquesa Agentine, quer se casar comigo?"Essa proposta nada mais era do que um casamento para manter as aparências e sem o amor envolvido.

"Hitokiri" Girl Becomes Bodyguard For The Duke's Daughter

description.en:
Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". 

Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution:

"If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"

altTitles.en: Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!

altTitles.pl: Nie drocz się ze mną, Nagatoro!

altTitles.vi: Đừng bắt nạt anh nữa, Nagatoro!!!
Đừng chọc anh nữa mà, Nagatoro-san

description.en:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10042/episode/313808) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/dont-toy-with-me-miss-nagatoro/)
description.es:
Naoto Hachioji está en segundo de bachillerato, es un chico tan tímido e introvertido como buen dibujante. Un día, mientras busca un sitio donde sentarse a dibujar en la biblioteca, se le caen las páginas del manga que hacía, justo al lado de un grupo de chicas que, al verlas, se ríen de él en su cara y se van… excepto una estudiante de primero, Hayase Nagatoro, que básicamente empieza a darle caña hasta hacerlo llorar.

Desde entonces, Nagatoro y consecuentemente sus amigas, no van a parar de rayar a su “senpai” y molestarlo de todas las maneras posibles… Pero hay tres cosas a tener en cuenta: Nagatoro es especialmente tocanarices cuando están a solas, se molesta bastante si sus amigas se pasan con él, y en definitiva lo que ella busca es que su senpai salga de su burbuja autoimpuesta para que se divierta y conozca un poco el mundo que lo rodea… y quizás algo más…
description.ja: 憎たらしいけど愛おしい。苦しいのに傍にいたい。あなたの中の何かが目覚める、“Sデレ少女”の物語。
description.pl:
Naoto Hachiouji to nieśmiały chłopak, którego mało co przeraża tak, jak wredne dziewczyny. Nic więc dziwnego, że jego największym szkolnym koszmarem zostaje Nagatoro – koleżanka z niższego roku, która obrała go sobie za cel, regularnie serwując mu atrakcje z pogranicza wojskowej fali i końskich zalotów. Choć wydawać by się mogło, że szkolne życie chłopaka na zawsze pozostanie pasmem nieszczęść, nieoczekiwanie relacja tych dwojga zaczyna zmierzać w niespodziewanym kierunku…

(źródło: Studio JG)
description.ru: Нагаторо - переведённая ученица в старшей школе, которой нравится дразнить своего семпая. Но он всё стерпит. И пусть ему придётся пройти через все виды издевательств - он всё простит, потому что влюблён.
description.es-la: A la estudiante de preparatoria Hayase Nagatoro le encanta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo una cosa, ¡y eso es molestar a su Senpai! Después de que Nagatoro y sus amigos se topan con los dibujos del aspirante a artista, disfrutan molestando sin piedad al tímido Senpai. Nagatoro decide continuar con su cruel juego y lo visita a diario para poder obligar a Senpai a hacer lo que le interese en ese momento, especialmente si eso lo hace sentir incómodo. Ligeramente interesado por Nagatoro y algo temeroso de ella, Senpai está constantemente involucrado en sus payasadas mientras sus intereses, pasatiempos, apariencia e incluso personalidad se usan en su contra mientras ella se entretiene a sus expensas. A medida que pasa el tiempo, Senpai se da cuenta de que no le desagrada la presencia de Nagatoro, y los dos desarrollan una amistad incómoda mientras uno soporta pacientemente las payasadas del otro.
description.pt-br: Nagatoro é uma menina de primeiro ano na escola que adora fazer bullying com seu Senpai. Mas ele aceita isso, mesmo depois de ter passado por todos os tipos de situações humilhantes e embaraçosas, porque ele está apaixonado por ela.

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

description.en:
Young Claire lives with her mother and her twin sister in a humble country home. Feeling mature for her age, Claire is tired of being different from everyone she's ever met. However, when her father suddenly appears, she realizes that she wasn't the only "strange" one in the family. As she slowly learns about her family's past, she understands more about herself and her destiny.

---

description.fr:
Dans un monde où sont tombés du ciel des Astariols, demi-dieux envoyés pour lutter contre le mal, la petite Claire est une enfant dont la maturité d'esprit et les pouvoirs surnaturels la démarquent des autres enfants de son âge. Elle vit avec sa sœur jumelle Rashel et sa mère Charlotte, de village en village au fil de leurs déménagements inopinés. Mais tout change lorsque le duc Arshel Constantine Disandos débarque subitement dans leur vie.

description.ja:
普通の子どもとはどこか違う「クレール」は
双子の「イシエル」と母の「シャーロット」と共に暮らしていた。

そんな彼女が９歳になった春。
突然、存在すらも知らなかった父が目の前に現れた…！

「静かに暮らしていたのにどうして今になって訪ねてきたの？セルシアス公爵閣下」
「でしたらもうそろそろ賑やかになってもいい頃合いでは？」

…誰か2人の関係を説明してくれない？

Młoda Claire mieszka z matką i siostrą bliźniaczką w skromnym wiejskim domu. Czując się dojrzałą jak na swój wiek, Claire jest zmęczona byciem inną od wszystkich, których kiedykolwiek spotkała. Jednak kiedy nagle pojawia się jej ojciec, zdaje sobie sprawę, że nie była jedyną "dziwną" osobą w rodzinie. W miarę jak powoli poznaje przeszłość swojej rodziny, rozumie więcej o sobie i swoim przeznaczeniu.

description.en:
She would have to marry the son of another organization?!

Yang Hye-jin had completely cut ties with her family right after she entered college, in pursuit of peaceful a daily life. It has been nine years since she left her violent father and her ignorant brother, who resembled him. However, her family suddenly appears and unilaterally announces her marriage with an unwanted partner, Moo Kang. Can Hye-jin and Moo Kang swear their entire lives in this marriage, which consists of a contract between organizations, and where death is the only path should they do not accept it?

---
The Yang and Kim families were once rival gangs with construction company fronts that spilled blood over a smidgen of gold. But a new company has entered the picture, and now both their stakes are at risk. Reluctantly, they form an alliance… sealed with an arranged marriage between their children, Hyejin and Moogahng! However, Hyejin’s past traumas keep her heart guarded, and Moogahng shrouds himself in mystery. It doesn’t seem like any amount of blood, tears, or gold will make their marriage better. But can love make this troubled pair work?

---

description.es:
¡¿Tengo que casarse con el hijo de otra organización?! Yang Hye-jin había cortado completamente los lazos con su familia justo después de que ella ingresó a la universidad, en busca de una vida diaria pacífica. Han pasado nueve años desde que dejó a su padre violento y a su hermano ignorante, que se parecía a él. Sin embargo, su familia aparece de repente y anuncia unilateralmente su matrimonio con una pareja no deseada, Moo Kang. ¿Pueden Hye-jin y Moo Kang jurar toda su vida en este matrimonio, que consiste en un contrato entre organizaciones, y donde la muerte es el único camino en caso de que no lo acepten?

---

description.id:
Dia harus menikahi anak lelaki dari organisasi lain?! Yang Hye-jin telah benar-benar memutuskan hubungan dengan keluarganya setelah dia masuk perguruan tinggi, untuk mengejar kehidupan sehari-hari yang damai. Sudah sembilan tahun sejak dia meninggalkan ayahnya yang kejam dan saudara laki yang bodoh, yang mirip dengannya. Namun, keluarganya tiba-tiba muncul dan secara sepihak mengumumkan pernikahannya dengan pasangan yang tidak diinginkan, Moo Kang. Bisakah Hye-jin dan Moo Kang bersumpah seumur hidup mereka dalam pernikahan ini, yang terdiri dari kontrak antar organisasi, dan di mana kematian adalah satu-satunya jalan jika mereka tidak menerimanya?

---

ヤクザの家を出たのに
ライバル組織のボスの息子ムガンと
政略結婚することに…

受け入れなければ死あるのみ
3年間だけ耐えよう…

でもなぜかムガンは乗り気で…

この男なんだか危険な香りがする…?!

description.ko:
다른 조직의 아들과 계약 결혼을 해야 한다고?! 평온한 일상을 위해 대학 입학 후 싸움만 일삼는 집안과는 연을 완전히 끊고 바르게 살아가고 있는 아가씨, 양혜진. 손부터 먼저 나가는 폭력적인 아버지와 그를 똑 닮은 무식한 오빠를 떠난 지도 9년째, 하지만 가족들은 갑자기 나타나 원하지도 않는 상대 무강과의 결혼을 일방적으로 알린다. 조직 간의 계약으로 이루어진 정략 결혼, 받아들이지 않으면 죽음 뿐인 이 결혼에서 과연 혜진과 무강은 평생을 맹세할 수 있을까?

description.ru:
Ей придется выйти замуж за сына другой организации ?!

Ян Хе Джин полностью порвала связи со своей семьей сразу после поступления в колледж в погоне за мирной повседневной жизнью.

Прошло девять лет с тех пор, как она оставила своего жестокого отца и своего невежественного брата, который был похож на него.

Однако внезапно объявляется ее семья и объявляется ее браке нежелательным партнером Му Каном.

Могут ли Хе Джин и Му Кан поклясться всю свою жизнь в этом браке, который состоит из контракта между организациями, отказавшись от которого вознаградит смертью?

description.pt-br:
Ela teria que se casar com o filho de outra organização ?! Yang Hye-jin cortou completamente os laços com sua família logo depois que ela entrou na faculdade, em busca de uma vida diária pacífica. Passaram-se nove anos desde que ela deixou seu pai violento e seu irmão ignorante, que se parecia com ele. No entanto, sua família aparece de repente e anuncia unilateralmente seu casamento com um parceiro indesejado, Moo Kang. Hye-jin e Moo Kang podem jurar suas vidas inteiras neste casamento, que consiste em um contrato entre organizações, e onde a morte é o único caminho que eles deveriam não aceitar?

Became the Chef of the Dragon King

description.en:
Shim Cheongi threw herself into the sea of Indangsu! What will happen when she wakes up in a lazy dragon's dungeon? Meet many cute monsters while living a delicious, symbiotic life!

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/dragon-chef/list?title_no=2306)
description.id:
Kenapa raja naga ini tidak memakanku? Apa jangan-jangan dia suka dengan masakanku...?!

아버지를 위해 인당수에 몸을 던진 심청.
귀차니즘 실버드래곤 베르키스의 던전에서 깨어나다?

"용왕님!"

부지런한 청이와 더 자고 싶은 베르키스, 사연 많은 귀염뽀짝 몬스터들의 맛있는 공생라이프!

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢EPISODE.Gレクイエム

description.en: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

altTitles.ja: 二度と自撮り送ってやんない！

altTitles.en: I'll never send a selfie again!

altTitles.ru: Я больше никогда не буду отправлять тебе селфи!

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

description.en:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

title.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of the Demon King

altTitles.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of Demon King

description.en: A female assassin from the modern era transmigrates into a cheesy Western-themed fantasy otome game and needs to make the Demonic male leads fall in love with her in order to save the world. Bent on returning to reality, she begins to train the assassination skills of the evil second female lead, Lisa, in the hope that Lisa will kill her, but because of her stubbornly silly personality and various types of ambiguous physical contact, she made Lisa fall in love with her?

title.en: I Raised a Nine Tailed Fox Wrongly

altTitles.es-la: Malcrié a un zorro de nueve colas

description.en:
One day, I met a spirit. And it wasn't just anyone, but a gumiho puppy. As I worried about the little one's fate, I met a priestess from the eastern continent, who told me to raise him until he reached maturity and then send him back home. Raising a little fox...

How could a cursed human welcome and care for a young life? It was strange and scary, but I couldn't refuse.

The fox, Ran, was just adorable. So, with much love and care, I raised him... But when he grew up, he became as seductive as I've heard of his kind, and he refused to be independent. All the training he had given seemed to have been in vain, with that lewd look.

"You can’t run away."
"Keep being good and help me, Scyllia. By my side."

Forever...

Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
description.ko:
최강의 무가 사미온에서 외팔이 방계로 태어난 데이븐.
반쪽짜리 무인이라며 갖은 조롱과 멸시를 딛고 사미온의 직계 천재마저 넘어섰으나,
결국 가문과 부모에게 버림받아 가장 초라한 최후를 맞이하게 되는 줄 알았는데...
500년 뒤 새로운 몸에서 눈을 떴다!

‘내게도 오른팔이 있다?’

새로운 가문의 적통.
천부적인 재능의 육체.
전생의 경험.
그리고 그와 함께하는 신까지.

환생을 했더니, 모든 것이 달라져 있었다.

description.en: Kitahara Kei is a screenwriter whose prodigious talent is taking the world by storm, but the people on whom he models his protagonists invariably end up dead. Dismayed by the misfortunes piling up in his wake, he abandons the pen and falls into dissipation, spending his days drinking in underground bars. One night when Kei is drunk and collapsed in the street, he is approached by a young amateur photographer named Youichi. Kei finds himself irresistibly drawn to Youichi’s ever-changing expressions, his radiantly pure smile, and sometimes sultry gaze… Being with Youichi, Kei finds the words spilling out of him once more, and yet he knows that he will only bring misfortune to Youichi…

Collection of one-shots about an egocentric and workaholic couple.  
  
This series is from the artist's Weibo, so no set update.  
Weibo: @喜喜果  
Twitter: @kikiko_xixiguo
description.fr: Ils sont collègues, ils sont amants, mais au travail l'amour n'a pas sa place et tous les coups sont permis !

description.en:
The cute and funny adventures of a boy and his best friend.  
  
Note: The story starts at chapter 42. The earlier chapters contain insert art of the characters by the author.
description.pl: Opowieść o przygodach czwórki przyjaciół. Zbieżność w numeracji rozdziałów wynika z zastosowania odmiennego niż angielska grupa systemu liczbowania dodatków – tłumaczenia są mniej więcej na tym samym etapie.
description.zh: 幼儿园里的一次合影是见一、展正希一辈子情谊的起点。一起长大的发小在校园里又遇见了贺天、莫关山这些好朋友。《19天》不仅仅是四人轻松愉快的校园日常，也是男孩们相互理解帮助最终成长的青春物语。

title.en: The Ultimate Wantless Godly Rich System

description.en: Hang Xingwang, who had been silently enduring life as a corporate slave, suddenly awakened the Ultimate Freedom System. The more he indulges, the richer he becomes! From then on, the lowly operations staff transforms into the top boss, stepping on simps and punching snobs in the face. Thus begins his journey as a godly tycoon!

Geon is a personal trainer in desperate need of new clients or else he'll be fired. So when he encounters the overweight Gyuwon decked out in designer brands, he sees it as a golden opportunity. Unfortunately, this comes at the cost of heeding Gyuwon's request to go on a date with him once he achieves his dream body. When Gyuwon transforms into Geon's ideal type a year later, Geon finds himself slowly drawn to him. Will Geon be able to resist the seemingly perfect younger, rich, and hot guy? Or will he succumb to temptation and fall for him?

One day, a circus troupe came across the street from Eden's school. Passing by the barracks, Eden meets the ring master of the troupe, Luke. Eden, who feels guilty for Luke for a certain childhood incident, recognizes him at one glance. However, Luke does not recognize him, and Eden felt upset leads him to getting drunk at the circus welcome party. The two accidentally spend a passionate night and quickly become close. Enamoured by Eden's cute and unguarded natural, Luke, who has lived a prosperous and carefree life so far, can't stop himself from falling for him. Eden is also attracted to Luke, who has grown up to be serious and cool, unlike when his young self, but the rumours about him being a Casanova leave him uneasy.
description.fr: Un jour, une troupe de cirque traverse la rue de l'école d'Eden. En passant devant les baraquements, Eden rencontre le maître de piste de la troupe, Luke. Eden, qui se sent coupable envers Luke pour un certain incident d'enfance, le reconnaît d'un coup d'œil. Cependant, Luke ne le reconnaît pas, et Eden, contrarié, le conduit à se saouler à la fête de bienvenue du cirque. Les deux passent accidentellement une nuit passionnée et deviennent rapidement proches. Émerveillé par le naturel mignon et non dissimulé d'Eden, Luke, qui a vécu une vie prospère et insouciante jusqu'à présent, ne peut s'empêcher de tomber amoureux de lui. Eden est également attirée par Luke, qui a grandi et est devenu sérieux et cool, contrairement à sa jeunesse, mais les rumeurs selon lesquelles il serait un Casanova le mettent mal à l'aise.

description.en: High schoolers (and stepsisters) Yuzu and Mei have gone public with their relationship! The two are happy to be dating out in the open, but friends and family keep trying to butt in with advice. Can Yuzu and Mei figure things out on their own?
description.it: Seguito di Citrus ambientato dopo la fine del manga! Yuzu è riuscita a convincere Mei a tornare da lei e le ha chiesto di sposarla! In Citrus+ seguiremo le vicende delle due ragazze una volta riunite e delle loro amiche che non le lasciano mai sole.
description.pt-br: As estudantes do ensino médio (e meias-irmãs) Yuzu e Mei foram a público com seu relacionamento! As duas estão felizes em namorar ao ar livre, mas amigos e familiares continuam tentando se aproximar com conselhos. Yuzu e Mei podem resolver as coisas sozinhas?

description.en: Freelance photographer Akihito Takaba is captured by the very subject he's been stalking in his viewfinder – the handsome and enigmatic crime lord Ryuichi Asami! The older man ravages him, both body and mind. Does this mean the end for the naive photographer, or will he live to shoot another day?
In a city overflowing with heinous crimes and violence, two girls make it their job to kill criminals who can not be dealt with by police.

altTitles.ja: 勇者くんは旅立てない

description.en:
The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!!

And now its time to set out!!

...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills...

Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?

Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

altTitles.en: The Things Melvin Left Behind for Them

description.en:
"This is a perfunctory marriage we are carrying out for the sake of protecting you and helping your efforts for revenge."
Cheryl, the beloved lady of Neus Castle.
One night, her uncle rebels, killing her older brother. She, too, was in danger of being killed. Just as she was about to give up in her last moments, someone comes to save her.
"If they want to kill my fiancee, then Neus Castle must be prepared for war."
The Lord of Blaire Castle, Felix, who saves her in the face of a fake engagement. Thus, she begins an unfamiliar married life with the one she had only ever known as her brother's friend.

Ian is a painter with a natural-born talent, but his love for painting is soon lost after being forced to work for the cruel and greedy Bardi family. No one knows that he's the genius behind the beautiful works of art that the famous family claims as their own. That is until one day, when the wealthy merchant Raymond comes for a portrait and his interest in Ian is piqued… Can Raymond help him to see the beauty in the world again? Or will Ian's true talent forever remain unseen?

altTitles.th: อ่านชะตาวันสิ้นโลก

altTitles.ja: 全知的な読者の視点から

altTitles.vi: Góc nhìn của Độc giả Toàn tri

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en:
Satoshi Onoe prides himself on his good writing and ethical reporting for the weekly magazine he writes for. But when the stakeout teams are shuffled around, he ends up being paired up with Motoharu Kaburagi, an ill-mannered photographer who's nothing but trouble. Onoe despises Kaburagi's haphazard and unethical reporting methods, and the two constantly fight. But as they spend more time together, Kaburagi's two-faced attitude makes Onoe begin to see him in a different light.  


---
description.pl: Onoe myślał, że wreszcie dopisało mu szczęście; zaczął umawiać się z śliczną dziewczyną i otrzymał wymarzoną pracę w wydawnictwie, w dziale z polityką. Wszystko jednak prysło jak bańka mydlana, nim zdążył nacieszyć się swoim prywatnym i zawodowym sukcesem; jego dziewczyna rzuciła się w ramiona innego, a on sam został oddelegowany do działu Firsts, zajmującego się gwiazdami show-biznesu. Ale myśl, że los postanowił z niego okrutnie zadrwić zamajaczyła dopiero wówczas, gdy okazało się, iż Onoe ma współpracować z 'Kabu' - facetem, którego w pracy wszyscy doceniają, a dziewczyny piszczą na sam jego widok… Czy muszę dodawać, iż jest to ten sam facet, który odbił mu dziewczynę?

description.en: Chen Cheng had an unexpected encounter in Nandu University. She discovered the secret of Wen Jiaqin, a popular actor. It turns out that his persona of a "good little brother" was fake! He is simply a naive and childish person! But, does she now know too much? Is she going to be silenced?

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~ Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week ~ 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en:
Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai’s time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. 

Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi’s orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school… 

Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

description.en: Jiseo, born with the fate of the second child of God. Hyunjin, who appeared before Jiseo as he lamented his fate, tries to help him but ends up being possessed by a ghost...

The Other World's Magic Is Too Far Behind!

altTitles.zh: 异世界魔法实在太落后！

description.en:
Suimei and two of his best friends find themselves mysteriously summoned to another world. There’s a cute princess, magic galore, a Demon Lord that needs to be defeated, and a world that needs to be saved — the works! Too bad Suimei isn’t interested.

His friends are all too ready to play the parts of heroes, but Suimei just wants to get home. He has an advantage as a magician... but he’s in for a rude awakening when he finds out what actually passes for magic in these parts.
description.fr: Un héros est invoqué dans un autre monde depuis le Japon moderne… Et ses deux amis par accident aussi… Yakagi Suimei transporté par erreur, refuse de combattre les armées du Roi Démon … Suivons la rencontre de Felmenia Stingray, magicienne royale, et Yakagi Suimei, Magicien moderne.
description.pt:
Baseado em uma série de Light Novel, Isekai Mahou wa Okureteru conta a história de uma jovem maga chamada Felmenia Stingray, que conhece um garoto que está aprisionado por se recusar a ajudar o Herói a derrotar o rei demônio depois de ser convocado (acidentalmente) para um outro mundo. "Romance"  
  


---
description.pt-br: Baseado em uma série de Light Novel, Isekai Mahou wa Okureteru, conta a história de uma jovem maga chamada Felmenia Stingray, que conhece um garoto que está aprisionado por se recusar a ajudar o Herói a derrotar o rei demônio depois de ser convocado (acidentalmente) para um novo mundo.

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

description.en:
Imamura Hinata is a high school boy with a cute appearance.  
Since his trauma with the first love, he wanted to be more manly than anybody else. But one day he woke up to something different…  
The total opposite of his ideal male body!   
Pandemic love comedy!  
  ***
Trivia : Tensei Here Written as (転性) = (性) Means Gender, Not Tensei (転生) = Reincarnation/Re-Living (生)  
  


---
description.fr: Imamura Hinata est un jeune lycéen androgyne. Depuis son traumatisme avec son premier amour, il rêve d’être le plus viril de tous les hommes. Mais un jour, lorsqu’il se réveille, quelque chose en lui a changé… Tout le contraire d’un corps de rêve musclé ! Une comédie romantique contagieuse !
description.pt-br:
Imamura Hinata é um garoto do ensino médio com uma aparência feminina. Desde seu trauma com o primeiro amor, ele desejou ser mais viril. Mas um dia ele acordou com algo diferente... O completo oposto do seu corpo tão desejado!
***
Curiosidade: *Tensei* aqui é escrito 転性 (性 significa gênero), e não 転生 (生 significa reencarnação/reviver).

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.es: La hija más querida del villano

altTitles.th: บุตรสาวผู้ล้ำค่าของวายร้าย

altTitles.vi: Đứa Con Gái Quý Giá Của Nhân Vật Phản Diện
Cô Công Chúa Nhỏ Của Kẻ Phản Diện

description.en:
My name is Rosaria von Valencia, but I didn't always have this name. According to a book I read, I'm supposed to be murdered in place of the saint, Cordelia, just because I look like her. I decided to run away to avoid ever meeting my future killer, Duke Valencia, but ended up running into him as he was on the brink of death. After I saved him in the hopes of being spared, he adopted me as his daughter! Now that my new dad's spoiling me with love, does this mean I'll get to live until the end?

---
It's already unfair that I suffered greatly because I closely resembled the saint, but why did the villain kill me without any mercy at all? No, actually, it said in the book that I was really bound to die. 'My life is already ruined. Of all things, why do I have to be the one to die a ridiculous death?' There's still hope! I haven't met any of the characters yet so I'll just run away! But why did the villain collapse in front of me...?

With a lot of effort, I barely saved the life of the villain who was on the brink of death. But now he's saying that he wanted to adopt me as his daughter and raise me to be a saint?! Just like that, I decided to become his daughter for a few days before leaving quietly.

"My daughter is a genius. There's no child who is more angelic in this world other than my daughter."

...I think I have coaxed my dad too well. Even the guys who originally followed the real saint started to pay attention to me. What went wrong? Aren't you guys supposed to hate me?!

---

description.es:
Ya es injusto que sufrí mucho porque me parezco mucho a la Santa, pero ¿por qué el villano me mató sin piedad?No, en realidad, decía en el libro que estaba destinado a morir.'Mi vida ya está arruinada. De todas las cosas, ¿por qué tengo que ser yo quien tenga una muerte ridícula?¡Todavía hay esperanza! Todavía no he conocido a ninguno de los personajes, ¡así que me escaparé!Pero, ¿por qué el villano colapsó frente a mí...?Con mucho esfuerzo, apenas salvé la vida del villano que estaba al borde de la muerte.¡¿Pero ahora dice que quería adoptarme como su hija y criarme para ser una Santa?!Así como así, decidí convertirme en su hija por unos días antes de irme en silencio.—Mi hija es un genio. No hay niña más angelical en este mundo que mi hija.…Creo que he engatusado a mi padre demasiado bien.Incluso los chicos que originalmente seguían a la verdadera Santa empezaron a prestarme atención.¿Qué salió mal? ¡¿No se supone que ustedes me odian?!

---

description.id:
Namaku Cordelia, sama seperti nama saintess yang parasnya juga mirip sekali denganku. Menurut buku yang aku baca, di masa depan nanti aku akan mati di tangan seorang duke yang salah mengiraku sebagai saintess. Aku bermaksud untuk kabur dari takdir itu, tapi aku malah bertemu dengan sang duke jahat dan dia mengangkatku sebagai anaknya! "Tidak masalah kan kalau aku jadi anak angkatnya sebentar?" Apakah aku akan bernasib sama isi buku itu? Omong-omong, aku baca di mana ya buku itu?

---

description.ko:
성녀와 닮았다는 이유로 납치당한 것도 억울한데
악당은 가차 없이 나를 죽였다.

아니, 그렇게 죽을 거라고 책에 쓰여 있었다.

‘이번 생은 망했어. 하필이면 어이없이 죽는 역할이야?’

아직 희망은 있었다.
등장인물들과 아무도 만나지 않은 지금, 도망쳐야 한다!
그런데 왜 악당이 내 앞에 쓰러져 있지……?

죽을 고비에서 겨우 악당을 구했더니
이젠 그가 성녀가 될 재목이라며 나를 딸로 입양했다?!
기왕 이렇게 된 거, 며칠 딸 노릇 하다가 조용히 떠나려고 했는데

“내 딸은 천재다. 내 딸처럼 천사 같은 아이는 이 세상에 없지.”

……아빠를 너무 잘 꼬셔 버린 것 같다.

심지어 진짜 성녀를 따라다니던 남자들도 내게 관심을 갖기 시작했다.

왜 이래? 나 너희들 싫거든?!

---

Я знала, что моя судьба быть похищенной и убитой потому что мы со святой похожи.
Планировала сбежать до того, как снова встречусь с злым герцогом, но...
Не могу поверить, что я упала у него на глазах!
И он даже спас меня от смерти и удочерил!
Несколько дней я старалась играть в хорошего ребенка, но неожиданно герцог становился дураком, зависимый от своей дочери...

description.sk:
Volám sa Rosaria von Valencia, ale nie vždy som sa tak volala. Podľa knihy, ktorú som čítala, ma mali zavraždiť namiesto svätice Cordelie len preto, že sa na ňu podobám. Rozhodla som sa utiecť, aby som sa nikdy nestretla so svojím budúcim vrahom, vojvodom Valenciom, ale nakoniec som naňho narazila, keď bol na pokraji smrti. Po tom, čo som ho zachránila v nádeji, že ma v budúcnosti ušetrí, si ma adoptoval za svoju dcéru! Teraz, keď ma môj nový otec rozmaznáva láskou, znamená to, že budem žiť až do konca?

description.vi:
Vì gần giống với Thánh nữ mà chịu nhiều đau khổ, đã là rất bất công rồi, nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại xuống tay với mình không một chút thương sót chứ?

Không, thật ra, ở trong sách, mình sẽ chết như vậy.

“Cuộc đời mình bị huỷ hoại cả rồi. Sau tất cả, sao mình lại phải chịu một cái chết lố bịch như vậy chứ?”

Mình vẫn còn cơ hội! Mình vẫn chưa chạm mặt bất kì nhân vật nào nên mình sẽ bỏ chạy!

Nhưng sao nhân vật phản diện lại đổ gục trước mắt mình…?

Mình đã rất cố gắng để cứu sống nhân vật phản diện đang cận kề cái chết.

Nhưng anh ta nói muốn nhận mình làm con gái và nuôi dạy mình trở thành Thánh nữ?!

Và như thế, mình đồng ý trở thành con gái của anh ta vài ngày trước khi lẳng lặng rời đi.

“Con gái ta là thiên tài. Không có đứa trẻ nào trên thế giới này hơn được con gái ta đâu.”…Mình nghĩ mình nịnh cha rất tốt đó.

Ngay cả những người lúc đầu đi theo vị Thánh nữ thật cũng bắt đầu để ý đến mình.

Chuyện gì đây? Chẳng phải họ ghét mình á?

---

title.en: Minecraft: Journey to the World's End

altTitles.ja-ro: Minecraft: Sekai no Hate no Tabi

description.en:
The adventure to the end of the world begins!

The world-famous game with the theme of "freedom" makes its grand debut as a manga!
Don't miss the crafting that is even freer than in the game!
Join the main character Nico and his friends as they set off on an adventure to the "end of the world"!
Familiar characters and items from the game will also appear!

title.en: What the Duke Picked up in the Forest

altTitles.en: The Duke Picked up Something in the Forest

altTitles.fr: Ce qui le duc ramassa dans la forêt

altTitles.es: El duque cogió algo en el bosque
Lo que el duque recogió en el bosque

description.en:
“I’m going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.”

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a ‘sign’ in a family that received God’s protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...
description.fr: Élisia Creed est de retour dans son corps de 10 ans."Mais pourquoi à ce moment précis ?"La personne qui l'a sauvée, qui était presque la proie des chiens sauvages dans la forêt de minuit, est le duc Balne, le protagoniste de toutes sortes de rumeurs dangereuses.Elle a vécue 29 vies dans le malheur à cause de sa belle-mère, qui cherche désespérément à la tuer, et de son père froid et négligent. C'était la dernière chance que Dieu lui a donnée. Avec l'aide du duc, Élysia change son destin.
description.zh:
重生30次遇见危险公爵
这次要亲手改变不幸的命运
艾莉希雅·克雷德回来了！再一次回到了自己儿时的身体里。这倒不是坏事，可为什么偏偏回到了这个时间点啊？在午夜的森林里，有着各种危险传闻的瓦尔恩公爵，救了差点被一群野狗撕咬的她。因为绞尽脑汁想要夺走她的性命的继母，和对此冷眼旁观、放任不管的父亲，艾莉希雅过了29次悲惨的人生。这是神给予她的最后一次机会，这一次艾莉希雅在公爵的帮助之下，开始了改写自己命运的故事！

altTitles.en: The Girl Who Can See Them

altTitles.th: มิเอรุโกะจัง ใครว่าหนูเห็นผี

altTitles.de: Mieruko-chan - Die Geister, die mich riefen

description.en:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
description.ru: Мико — старшеклассница, проклятая шестым чувством; у нее есть способность видеть призраков- Она пытается жить обычной жизнью, но трудно, когда призраки продолжают преследовать ее- Она также может видеть души людей, и она понимает, что люди — настоящие монстры.В один «прекрасный» день старшеклассница внезапно начала видеть призраков! Она не может от этого избавиться, но изо всех сил старается вести себя так, будто вообще их не видит. История девушки с шестым чувством начинается!

description.en:
Lee Jinhyuk has enjoyed his decade-long reign as Cornsilk, the undefeated number one PVP player in virtual reality game "The Abyss."

But with the sequel "Abyss World" resetting all players as newbies, Jinhyuk accepts a sudden sweet deal from his Abyss Studios developer half-brother Jinho to log in as the infamous boss monster Black Knight.

After slaying 100 rankers during the opening event, Jinhyuk agrees to keep the monster login scheme going... but will his unmatched talent blow his cover?
description.id: -Jinhyeok tidak pernah sekalipun kalah dalam game realitas virtual pemain PVP nomor satu "The Abyss". Dengan berita perilisan “Abyss World”, sekuel dari “The Abyss”, Jinhyeok menerima tawaran tak terduga dari saudaranya Jinho, seorang pengembang game. "Masuk sebagai monster." “… Apa yang kamu bicarakan?” Untuk memperingati peluncuran "Abyss World", dia bisa masuk sebagai karakter ikonik dari "The Abyss", "Black Knight", dan bersaing dengan pengguna. "Apa yang akan kamu lakukan untukku jika aku melakukan ini untukmu?" Pada akhirnya, Jinhyeok menerima sejumlah kondisi yang dicantumkan kakaknya sebagai hadiah, dan masuk sebagai "Ksatria Hitam". Bahkan setelah itu, dia akhirnya login sebagai sejumlah boss mob, termasuk “Hunter Hwirodren”, “Mirror King Replica”, dan “Mobile Captain Jackson”.

title.en: Zatsuyou Fuyo Jutsushi ga Jibun no Saikyou ni Kizuku made

altTitles.ja: 雑用付与術師が自分の最強に気付くまで

altTitles.en: Until the Chore-Granting Sorcerer Realized That He Is at His Strongest

description.en:
Wimme Strauss is an adjunct sorcerer who provides support and does odd jobs. However, after defeating the master of the hierarchy, he is expelled from the party by the leader, whose pride is hurt. Wimme is at a loss, but his childhood ~~stalker~~friend Heidemarie finds him and recruits him for the biggest party, the Wings of the Dragon.
"It's like a miracle ...... fuhehe."
He claims that his achievement is a coincidence, but it's only a matter of time before everyone around him realizes what he's capable of.

altTitles.en: TSUYOSHI: The one who no one can win against

altTitles.ja: TSUYOSHI 誰にも勝てない、アイツには

altTitles.ja-ro: TSUYOSHI: Daremo Katenai, Aitsu ni wa

altTitles.th: Tsuyoshi ไอ้หนุ่มหมัดพิฆาตลูกป๋องแป๋ง

description.en: A super-powerful guy keeps defeating everyone around him, even though he doesn't like fighting.

altTitles.ja: アネモネは熱を帯びる

description.en: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?
description.id: Nagisa Ootsuki melepaskan dirinya yang dulu karena malu karena gagal dalam ujian masuk sekolah menengahnya. Pada hari pertamanya di sekolah menengah barunya, siapa yang dia temui selain gadis yang membuatnya gagal dalam ujian! Bagaimana Nagisa menghadapi emosi yang rumit ini?
description.pt: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de chumbar nos exames de admissão ao liceu. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a rapariga que a fez chumbar no exame! Como é que Nagisa lida com estas complicadas emoções?
description.pt-br: Nagisa Ootsuki abandonou o seu antigo eu por vergonha de reprovar no exame de admissão ao Ensino Médio. No seu primeiro dia na nova escola secundária, quem é que ela encontra senão a menina que a fez falhar na prova! Como Nagisa lidará com estas emoções complicadas?

altTitles.es-la: Llora, aunque es mejor si suplicas

description.en: Orphaned at a young age, Layla Llewellyn feels like the luckiest girl in the world after she moves in with her uncle Bill, a gardener who lives on the scenic Arvis estate in the Berg Empire. To Layla, Arvis seems like paradise; she loves to explore the vast forest, always bringing her notebook to record the wildlife she encounters. She especially loves the birds, watching them with awe as they hatch and grow from fluffy chicks into beautiful birds. Duke Herhardt, the young, handsome lord of Arvis, is also interested in birds-and in Layla. But the difference is, he’s interested in birds because he likes to hunt them… and he’s interested in Layla because he likes to make her cry. If a lovely bird is trapped in a golden cage, which will she choose: a life of luxury, or freedom? (Source: kaiscans.com)
description.fr:
Orpheline depuis son plus jeune âge, Layla Llewellyn a l'impression d'être la fille la plus chanceuse du monde lorsqu'elle emménage chez son oncle Bill, un jardinier qui vit dans le magnifique domaine d'Arvis, dans l'empire Berg. 

Pour Layla, Arvis ressemble à un paradis ; elle adore explorer la vaste forêt, toujours munie de son carnet de notes pour noter la faune et la flore qu'elle rencontre. Elle aime tout particulièrement les oiseaux, qu'elle observe avec émerveillement au moment de l'éclosion et de la croissance des poussins duveteux qui deviennent de magnifiques oiseaux. 

Le duc Herhardt, le jeune et beau seigneur d'Arvis, s'intéresse également aux oiseaux et à Layla. Mais la différence, c'est qu'il s'intéresse aux oiseaux parce qu'il aime les chasser... et qu'il s'intéresse à Layla parce qu'il aime la faire pleurer. 

Si un bel oiseau est prisonnier d'une cage dorée, que choisira-t-il : une vie de luxe ou la liberté ?

description.en: After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.
description.uk: Після переродження Саї присягається вирватися з-під контролю прийомної матері.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!
An older lady finds interest & joy in beauty & make-up to help her cope with the loss of her husband.
